paragraphs: The game determines certain variables of this letter. The possibilities have been rendered in italicized brackets.

<italic>It seems our expedition to [dungeon name] has met with some resistance from its inhabitants. I know this isn't the first time, but if you would provide us with a few more men and supplies, we are certain the treasure there would yield a return on your investment.</italic>
<italic>If not, we could begin searching for prospects outside of [current hold].</italic>
A swift reply would be most appreciated.
